answerText: ecdysis[10] These periods mark the time between molts. They are used to mark the stages of an insect's development.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 3 | 19 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For 10 points each, give some things related to moulting in some, but not all, animals: [10] This term that is often used to refer to molting in general is technically the step of molting following apolysis where the cuticle is shed.
